references: Amending: Ord 110699; Related: Clerk File No. 294977
summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to land use and zoning; amending plat 12E, page 56 of the official Land Use Map to rezone certain property at N.W. 54th Street and 8th Avenue N.W. from Single Family 5000 (SF 5000) to Lowrise 1 (L-1) Zone, and accepting a Property Use and Development Agreement in connection therewith. (Petition of Greg Borba; C.F. \#294977).
